SELECT COUNT(NO) FROM EMPLOYEE
WHERE RESIGN_YN = 'N'
WHERE RESIGN_YN = 'Y'

SELECT M.NO, M.NAME, P.NAME POS_NO, D.NAME DEPT_NO, M.ID, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') ENROLL_DATE, RESIGN_YN FROM EMPLOYEE M LEFT OUTER JOIN POSITION P ON P.NO = M.POS_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.NO = M.DEPT_NO
WHERE RESIGN_YN = 'N'
WHERE RESIGN_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY M.NO ASC
